5th International Workshop on

Search-Based Software Testing

21st April, 2012, Montreal, Canada

In conjunction with ICST 2012

IEEE International Conference on Testing, Verification and Validation

Welcome & Call for papers | Important Dates | Paper Submission | Prizes | Program Committee | Keynote | Program | Sponsors | ICST 2012

Program: Saturday 21st April

09:15 - 09:30 Welcome & Introduction
09:30 - 10:30 Keynote: Westley Weimer (PDF)
10:30 - 11:00 Coffee Break
11:00 - 12:30 Regular Papers Session
  • Yury Pavlov and Gordon Fraser. Semi-Automatic Search-based Test Generation
  • Linda Di Geronimo, Filomena Ferrucci, Alfonso Murolo and Federica Sarro. A Parallel Genetic Algorithm Based on Hadoop MapReduce for the Automatic Generation of JUnit Test Suites
  • Matthias Woehrle. Search-based Stress Testing of Wireless Network Protocol Stacks
  • Romain Delamare and Nicholas A. Kraft. A Genetic Algorithm for Computing Class Integration Test Orders for Aspect-Oriented Systems
12:30 - 14:00 Lunch & Coffee Break
14:00 - 15:00 Tutorial
Simon Poulding. How can you make your SBST empirical results more compelling?
15:00 - 15:30 Best Paper Vote, Award & Workshop Wrap-up

If you have any queries, please contact the program chairs: Kiran Lakhotia email: k.lakhotia (at) cs.ucl.ac.uk or Wasif Afzal email: wasif.afzal (at) bth.se
